channel.title: My 110 Account
channel.description:
I was banned becasue my brother found my pass and traded some stuff over to his well I was banned and I sent this appeal.
Hello Jagex my name is *********** I owned ******* and always played on him till I had a accident at work which permanently disabled me from walking properly then my brother found my password and started using my account without me knowing. I was in agony when I found out my account was permanently banned. If you can find it in your heart to unban me it will be greatly appreciated. TY

item.title: My 110 Account
item.dc:creator: @Kabbraxis Kabbraxis
item.description:
@Kabbraxis wrote:

pnt… are you the real Pntbllfrk ?? as in from rscn/rei?
if so Hey
if not… dont pose…

Read full topic

item.title: My 110 Account
item.dc:creator: @Pntbllfrk Pntbllfrk
item.description:
@Pntbllfrk wrote:

Yes its possible to get unban, I’ve had one of my autoers unban with 80 fishing. I was really surprised.

Read full topic

item.title: My 110 Account
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

my lvl 91 main just got banned a few weeks ago for illegal client. 3 day only, but now i’m scared to even auto scar on it. I really want 85 magic, and i’m so close. If my main account it gone i’ll probably cry. i’ve had it since ~ 2001 (RSC) and i quit before phats, masks, santas, eggs, sythes. But still, if they ban me i’ll just have to auto that much harder to buy a good account

Read full topic

item.title: My 110 Account
item.dc:creator: @VG_Kobra VG_Kobra
item.description:
@VG_Kobra wrote:

[quote=“Dennis, post:10, topic:2376”][quote author=jme_009 link=topic=2544.msg23722#msg23722 date=1146779361]
Hate to break it to you, but it’s not coming back. If it was a member then you have a slight chance, buteither way m about 99% sure it gone forever.
[/quote]

Accualy i sent a message in to jagex when i got banned saying to go blow them selve and to fuck off you little fuckin nerds and so on and so forth… guess what i was unbanned[/quote]

You must be pretty pathetic for them ban to ban you when you send a bs appeal like that.

Read full topic

item.title: My 110 Account
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“Everyonedies, post:3, topic:2376”][quote author=jme_009 link=topic=2544.msg23722#msg23722 date=1146779361]
Hate to break it to you, but it’s not coming back. If it was a member then you have a slight chance, buteither way m about 99% sure it gone forever.
[/quote]

You mong, ive had everyonedies my rs account unbanned for much worse, you should get it unbanned if you say the right things.[/quote]

You just got lucky. I’ve had my share fair of experience + complaints from noobies posting about there accounts being perm banned.

Read full topic
